Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: எனைவகையான் தேறியக் கண்ணும் வினைவகையான் வேறாகும் மாந்தர் பலர்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Even when (a king) has tried them in every possible way, there are many men who change, from the nature of the works (in which they may be employed).

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown having passed numerous difficult tests ('எனைவகையான் தேறிய'), and is being awarded a medal of honor. They appear virtuous and capable.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The same person is then placed in a new, challenging work environment—perhaps a chaotic battlefield or a complex construction site ('வினைவகையான்'). Under the pressure of the new task, their form begins to change and corrupt ('வேறாகும் மாந்தர்'), revealing a different, less capable, or more treacherous nature that was previously hidden.
Layered_Composition.Background: A gallery of other figures are shown in the background, each with a similar 'before' and 'after' transformation, emphasizing that this is a common human trait ('பலர்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Even after someone has been thoroughly tested, their true nature can change and be revealed differently when they are faced with the specific nature of a real-world task.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The physical transformation or corruption of the person under the stress of the new job is the key visual metaphor. This shows that their character is not fixed but situational.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The 'testing' phase is lit with a clear, noble light. The 'working' phase is lit with a harsh, stressful light that causes the negative transformation. The colors shift from pure to corrupt.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that captures the 'before' and 'after' states, perhaps using a slow, transformative visual effect.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Dynamic lighting that shifts with the character's transformation.

Cultural_Anchors: Character changing with the nature of the work ('வினைவகையான் வேறாகும்')
The situational nature of human character.

Negative_Prompt: person remaining the same, succeeding at the new job, text artifacts, cartoonish transformation.
